name: Artisanal Fish Lantern: Carp's Well
description: A large paper lantern in the shape of carp symbolizing prayers for good fortune that can be seen throughout Chenyu Vale.\nIt is said that in Chenyu Vale, the nimble carp is not only the form an adeptus took, but also signifies abundance and great fortune. For this reason, the people commission specialists to create large carp lanterns that vividly recreate the graceful and agile appearance of carp swimming in the water, hoping for good luck and success in the coming year.
